channel.title: Posts on Poulpix's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Poulpix's Blog

item.title: Introduction
item.description: Welcome to Poulpix’s Blog ! I am Valentin, currently working as a “DevOps”. It’s a very common word in the IT world now, it should represent a whole philosophy of integration between Dev teams and Ops teams, but as a job it’s actually more about modern System Administration, with Cloud part, CDN part, CI/CD part, observability part. On this blog I will share interesting news (DevOps, Site Reliability Engineering, Systems Administration), or some cool tasks from my working environment (currently web), that could help mates.
